   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to PRISMDATA!
*********************

PRISMDATA is a python package for easy dowonloading and processing of PRISM climatic data.

Why PRISMDATA?
==============

PRISMDATA is a python package that simplifies the process of downloading and processing PRISM climatic data. 
With PRISMDATA, you can easily access and analyze PRISM climate data for various applications such as research, modeling, and decision-making.
Start using PRISMDATA today!
